title: Guarding Savage
description: Peter is led to Asia where he is unwittingly thrust into a modern conflict based upon centuries-old animosity in this highly-anticipated next installment of the Peter Savage series.In the East China Sea, Japanese and American warships, on scheduled training exercises, are attacked without warning and sunk by a hypersonic weapon for which there seems to be no defense. The U.S. Government receives an anonymous message—withdraw all military forces from Southeast Asia, or suffer total destruction of the Seventh Fleet.A young woman named Jade is viciously attacked in Bend, Oregon. She narrowly escapes harm when Peter steps in to protect her from the would-be kidnappers. But the threat remains as others are sent to complete the job. As Peter’s paternal bond with Jade grows, he finds his own life is at risk.In the nail-biting climax, Peter is summoned to Brunei where he discovers that Jade’s family harbors dangerous secrets aimed at ushering in a new World Order and posing a deadly threat to Jade and Peter.
author: Dave Edlund
